name: drnf2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wnf(s2, w0), wnf(s2, w1)))

stmt.origin: nfbidf(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wnf(s2, w0), wnf(s2, w1)))
-| wnf(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wnf(s2, w0), wnf(s2, w1)))
-| wnf(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wnf(s2, w0), wnf(s2, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 5-May-2018.)
